data.message: Hahaha! Look at all these Trump lovers butt hurt.  Love it Eminem! I'm standing on the other side of the line in solidarity with you! Keep your fist balled up like Trump's head!

replies.message: Eminem literally rapped for 4 whole albums about the same shit that makes you hate trump. Buuuuut you still love Eminem 🤔

Put simple.... You want to divide the nation, you love hating others, and your a hypocrite. Garaunteed if he dissed some democrat, a bunch of yous would be butt hurt too. Cuz we are all fans at the end of the day and an artist shouldnt divise his fans with a big fuck you.
Christopher Gregory Somehow I knew you were from Texas before even checking your profile. Talk about a walking stereotype.
Chris you're pathetic, I'm a trump supporter and I'm gonna get rid of that line, but his next album, get VIP to a Detroit show, and vote for trump again 🙂
But trumps is the great divider right? Comon

SEE THAT'S WHERE YOU ARE WRONG, WE'RE NOT HURT, YOU GUYS ARE, THAT'S WHY YOU ARE FULL OF SO MUCH HATE!  OUR GUY IS IN THE WHITE HOUSE, WHILE YOURS IS ON STAGE PITCHING A FIT LIKE A TODDLER WHO DIDN'T GET HIS NAP LOL!!!

Truly. We arent even remotely butt hurt. Em means nothing to me personally so I can give a rats arse. This doesnt come as a surprise as white man in a black mans industry he's going to want to kiss arse to keep his street cred.
Says the bitch who probably pirates music and doesn't spend a dime. 😂
Yea love the hate from the left embrace the hate be the hate!!
that is funny because I just watched a video of a very butthurt Eminem go off on lies and tantrums for 5 minutes...
